scripts.postinstall: npm run browserify && npm run copy-f7
scripts.copy-f7: cpy node_modules/framework7/dist/js/*.* www/framework7/js && cpy node_modules/framework7/dist/css/*.* www/framework7/css && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* www/fonts && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/css/framework7-icons.css www/css && cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} www/fonts && cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/material-icons.css www/fonts
scripts.run:android:clean: cordova clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run run:android
